#Text=Scottish man sentenced over ' grossly offensive ' joke on YouTube
#Text=Wednesday , April 25 , 2018
#Text=On Monday , Mark Meechan of Scotland was fined GBP 800 for a joke video he posted on YouTube .
#Text=He was found guilty of being " grossly offensive " in violation of the Communications Act of 2003 on March 20 .

#Text=Meechan , whose YouTube persona is " Count Dankula " , posted a video on the social media site in which he trained a pug , a small companion dog , to respond to spoken words such as " Sieg Heil " and " Gas the Jews " .

column1: #Text=Meechan had been facing possible time in prison for the offense .
#Text=File photo of Mark Meechan , from an online interview in 2017 .
#Text=Image : Bunty King .
#Text=Dozens of free speech advocates protested the conviction outside of the courthouse as Meechan 's punishment was delivered .
#Text=After the sentencing , Meechan insisted he had only been exercising his right to free speech and he intends to appeal .
#Text=Simultaneously , in London hundreds of protesters marched to Downing Street in support of Meechan .
#Text=In April of 2016 , Meechan uploaded a video titled " M8 Yer Dugs A Nazi " to YouTube in which he trained the dog to respond to certain spoken commands .
#Text=The dog , which belongs to his girlfriend Suzanne Kelly , learned to raise its front paw when the " Sieg Hitler " command was given , and react when the words " Gas the Jews " were spoken .
#Text=The video has been viewed over three million times .
#Text=Currently it is on ' restricted mode ' on YouTube .
#Text=In the video , which runs 2 minutes 23 seconds , Meechan states that he is not a racist .
#Text=Meechan 's defense , by attorney Ross Brown , maintained the video was a joke .
#Text=Meechan claimed he meant to annoy Kelly .
#Text=Director of the Scottish Council of Jewish Communities Ephraim Borowski testified for the prosecution .
#Text=" In many ways , the bit I found most offensive was the repetition of ' gas the Jews ' rather than the dog itself , " said Borowski .
#Text=" Material of this kind goes to normalize the antisemitic views that frankly we thought we had seen the last of[ ... ]

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=The sheriff court with Derek O'Carroll presiding in Airdrie , North Lanarkshire found that Meechan was guilty because the video was  anti-Semitic and racist in nature " .

column1: #Text=O'Carroll elaborated : " This court has taken the freedom of expression into consideration , but the right to freedom of expression also comes with responsibility .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=O'Carroll further said ,  The accused is quite obviously an intelligent and articulate man .

_	_	_	_

#Text=After the conviction , some British comedians voiced their support for Meechan .

#Text= If you do n't believe in a person 's right to say things that you might find ' grossly offensive ' , then you do n't believe in Freedom of Speech .
